event.hoursOnDutyText: Your Hours On-Duty are precisely tracked from Check-In to Check-Out for Compliant Payroll Processing.
event.hoursOnDutyLongText: You need to check-in when you start your workday. Your Hours On-Duty are precisely tracked from Check-In to Check-Out for Compliant Payroll Processing. Please press the Check-in button and scan the QR code on your truck.

agreementConditions1: Data Security : We take reasonable steps to secure your data, but we cannot guarantee that unauthorized third parties will never gain access to your information.
agreementConditions2: Data Sharing : We may share your data with third parties, such as payroll processors and insurance companies, but only with your consent.
agreementConditions3: Data Access:You have the right to access and review your data at any time. You can request access by contacting us at HR@portx.net.
agreementConditions4: Data Deletion:You have the right to request that we delete your data at the end of your service with Portx. Please note that deleting your data may prevent you from using the App and its services.
agreementConditions5: Disclaimer: The App and its information are provided 'as is' and without warranties of any kind, express or implied. Portx disclaims all warranties, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
agreementConditions6: Limitation of Liability :  Portx shall not be liable for any damages arising out of or related to the use of the App, including, but not limited to, direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages.
agreementConditions7: Indemnification: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Portx, its officers, directors, employees, agents, and affiliates from and against any and all claims, losses, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses (including attorney's fees) arising out of or related to your use of the App.
agreementConditions8: Dispute Resolution: Any dispute arising out of or related to this Agreement shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association ("AAA"). The arbitration shall be conducted in New Jersey. The arbitration award shall be final and binding and may be entered as a judgment in any court of competent jurisdiction.
agreementConditions9: Termination: This Agreement may be terminated by either you or Portx at any time. You may terminate this Agreement by deleting the App from your device. Portx may terminate this Agreement for any reason, with or without notice.
agreementConditions10: Entire Agreement: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between you and Portx regarding your use of the App and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous communications and agreements, whether oral or written.
agreementConditions11: Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New Jersey, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
agreementConditions12: Severability: If any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid or unenforceable, such provision shall be struck and the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
